patter.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if something, especially water, patters, it makes quiet sounds as it keeps hitting a surface lightly and quickly
patter.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: rain pattering on the window panes
patter.translation[1].definitions[0].def: the sound made by something as it keeps hitting a surface lightly and quickly
patter.translation[1].definitions[1].def: fast, continuous, and usually amusing talk, used by someone telling jokes or trying to sell something
patter.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: Itâ€™s difficult to look at the cars without getting the sales patter.
